article.headline: Nicholls St. 60, Sam Houston St. 59
article.story: HUNTSVILLE, Texas -- Justin Payne drove the length of the floor for a layup with one second left Wednesday night to give Nicholls State a 60-59 win over Sam Houston State. Nicholls State led throughout the game until Preston Brown hit a layup with six seconds left to give Sam Houston State (13-9, 7-2 Southland) a 59-58 lead. Ryan Bathie led Nicholls State (14-9, 7-3) with 19 points. Anatoly Bose added 12. Ashton Mitchell led the Bearkats with 14 points. Barkley Falkner added 10. Nicholls State led 26-20 at the half and by as much as nine points with 3:44 left in the game before Mitchell and Falkner each scored five points in the Sam Houston State rally.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
